product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with intuitive controls and multiple wash cycles
• Large capacity front-loading design for efficient washing
• Energy-efficient operation with customizable temperature settings
• Modern white exterior with sleek black door accent
• Multiple wash programs including Express, Delay, and Temperature control
• Easy-to-use selector dial for precise cycle customization
• Clear view door window to monitor wash progress
• Anti-vibration system with stabilizing feet
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for apartments and homes
• User-friendly control panel with clear function indicators
• Delay start feature for convenient washing schedule
• Water-saving technology with optimal wash performance

banner_details:
This banner features a modern appliance promotion with a bold, eye-catching layout. At the top, the message begins with a prominent main headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a futuristic sans-serif font, conveying excitement and innovation. Below it, a strong subheadline (`subheading`) highlights a product feature in a bold white typeface. The center is dominated by a scaled-down image of a sleek front-load washing machine (`product_image`), giving the banner focus and clarity. Just below, large pricing text (`price`) captures interest, paired with a solid-colored rectangle (`cta_background`) housing a clear call-to-action text (`cta`). The tagline (`tagline`) sits subtly below the subheadline. The background includes a smooth blue gradient with layered wave-like shapes and translucent circular elements for added dimension.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: `#0D47A1`
- Bright Blue: `#1E88E5`
- Accent Blue: `#2196F3`
- Light Blue: `#64B5F6`
- Pale Blue Highlights: `#E3F2FD`, `#BBDEFB`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a front-load washing machine with a sleek, modern aesthetic predominantly in white (#FFFFFF), paired with bold contrasts of black (#000000) and dark gray (#3C3C3C) around the door and control panel. A digital display glows in electric blue (#00BFFF), providing a futuristic touch. The brushed-metal dial details feature a cool silver-gray finish (#C0C0C0), adding sophistication. These colors blend in a minimalist manner while ensuring key components like the door, dial, and display are highlighted. For an advertisement banner, a clean, contemporary palette consisting of white, black, electric blue, silver, and charcoal gray will enhance product elegance and clarity.
